item.title: Education
item.description: Department of Construction and Real Estate, School of Civil Engineering, Southeast Univerisity, China Master of Management, GPA: 3.9 / 4.0, Ranking: 1 / 26 Bachelor of Management, GPA: 3.8 / 4.0, Ranking: 5 / 51

item.title: Skills
item.description: Languages: TOEFL: 108 (Speaking 27, Writing 29) GRE: 331 (Verbal 161, Math 170) Softwares and Tools: Excel, Word, Powerpoint, Endnote, Visio, SPSS, Eviews, AutoCAD, LaTeX

item.title: Publications
item.description: English Section Jing Du, Hongyue Wu, Xianbo Zhao, 2018. Critical Factors on the Capital Structure of Public-Private Partnership Projects: A Sustainability Perspective. Sustainability,10(6): 2066. (Corresponding author) https://doi.org/10.3390/su10062066 Jing Du, Hongyue Wu, Lei Zhu, 2018. Infuencing Factors on Prot Distribution of Public-Private Partnership Projects: Private Sectors Perspective. Advances in Civil Engineering, 2018: 10 pages. (Corresponding author) https://doi.org/10.1155/2018/2143173 Jing Du, Hongyue Wu, Lei Zhu, 2018. Research on the participation mode selection of construction enterprises in PPP projects.

item.title: Honors and Awards
item.description: Outstanding Graduates Awards, Southeast University, 2016 Outstanding Graduation Thesis, Southeast University, 2016 First Prize of Excellent Graduation Thesis of Jiangsu Province, the Education Department of Jiangsu Province, 2017 National Scholarship, Chinese Ministry of Education, 2017 The First Prize Scholarship, Southeast University, 2017 First Prize of Outstanding Paper of the Second Jiangsu Engineering Management Postgraduate Academic Forum, Jiangsu Civil Engineering and Architectural Society, 2017 Merit Student, Southeast University, 2017

item.title: Research Projects
item.description: Two-stage VFM Evaluation System of Infrastructure PPP projects Humanities and Social Science Foundation from the Ministry of Education (2016 - Present) Created a qualitative VFM evaluation system Collected data by several questionnaires and interviews Analyzed international documents to compare the qualitative VFM evaluation systems Application of PPP Mode on the Comprehensive Development of Land Along Railway Technology Research and Development Plan of Railway Corporation (2017 - 2018)
